edu.rit.crst

Class Adjacent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.crst.BitGroup
      • edu.rit.crst.Adjacent

  • public class Adjacent
extends BitGroup
    Class Adjacent provides an object that generates a series of output bit groups for a cryptographic Function. Each bit group consists of adjacent bit positions. The bit groups do not overlap.

      • Adjacent

        public Adjacent(int size)
        Construct a new bit group generator.
        Parameters:
        size - Bit size of this bit group (1 .. 8).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if size < 1 or size > 8.

    • Method Detail

      • constructor

        public java.lang.String constructor()
        Get a constructor expression for this bit group generator. The constructor expression can be passed to the edu.rit.util.Instance.newInstance() method to construct an object that is the same as this bit group generator.
        Specified by:
        constructor in class BitGroup
        Returns:
        Constructor expression.

      • bitGroupDescription

        public java.lang.String bitGroupDescription(int i)
        Get a description of the given bit group generated by this bit group generator.
        Specified by:
        bitGroupDescription in class BitGroup
        Parameters:
        i - Bit group index (0 .. count()−1.
        Returns:
        Description of bit group i.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if i is out of bounds.

      • generate

        protected void generate()
        Generate a series of bit groups for the cryptographic function. This method stores the bit groups in the protected bgs matrix. In the matrix, each row represents one bit group. The elements of a row give the bit positions for that bit group.
        Specified by:
        generate in class BitGroup
